name: Metanoia (itch) (Toby Carlyon, Zak Butcher, Alper Sozuoz, Amberlea)
name_original: Metanoia (itch) (Toby Carlyon, Zak Butcher, Alper Sozuoz, Amberlea)
description:
Built eons before written history stands a tall tower. Some believed it a place for worship, others claimed it to be where only a select few could go to harness the mystical power within. People travelled far and wide in hopes of being chosen… Until now.

The fields nearby continued to thrive despite the silent tower standing watch nearby- or that was until something changed. The lands began festering, clouds grew dark, the tower became eerie.

No one dared to enter the tower themselves- but you know that the only way to find answers, is to venture in yourself.

Can you stop whatever is affecting the tower? Or will you flee like the rest?

 

Play as Young, an adventurer within ‘Metanoia’ where your main objective is to slay the various enemies on each floor of the tower with his trusty sword and bombs strapped to his waist to reach the final level to defeat the wizard.

Utilise your sword to keep enemies at bay while using your bombs to destroy the floor and lay traps to aid you in combat.
